page.title: 18MEDIA
page.content: The most common newspaper read was the Liverpool Echo which is an evening paper. Of the Daily papers the Mirror, Sun and Star have equal demand; of the Sunday papers the News of the World was by far, the most popular. Most households buy a weekly magazine, the most popular are Woman and Woman's Own, Jackie, and the old faithfuls the Dandy and the Beano. Everyone listens to the local commercial radio station on a regular basis. Items on it lead to conversation topics as much as TV. TV is the centre of family life and plays a big role in peoples lives. The most popular are the soap operas (most activities on Monday and Wednesday start after 8p.m.). Sport and Nature programmes are next most popular. The Library is well used by all ages and all backgrounds.
